blogs.headline: Adam is cool
blogs.author: Adam Gorbahn
blogs.content: Adam like anime like Hellsing, S-cry-ed, and Black Blood Brother. Very good at programming and web.

blogs.headline: Stephen can program
blogs.author: Stephen
blogs.content: Stephen can program. He likes to porgram. He also speaksin in the 3rd person at times. Yes, it's weird. But he can't help it. Do you program? Don't answer that. I can't hear you....

blogs.headline: The guys
blogs.author: Violet Beauregarde
blogs.content: Stephen and Adam are awesome. I love working with them. All we do is play Nintendo all day. Wii!! Welp that's all I have to say about tha.
